name: Blackjack (PowerPlay Magazine)
overview: Stand pat on this essential version of the casino game of 21, created by Jerry A Sturdivant and published in Commodore Power/Play Vol.3 N.5 (December 1984/January 1985), and in Digital Marketing PD #114. This game is not only good practice for card counters, but fun for everyone. If you are one of those who wonder what the next card would have been, watch as these cards will appear in the original sequence.
